reference.title: Entry
reference.shortdesc: The maximum airspeed during entry is also a function of q-bar, which varies during descent.

note.p: If the maximum speed is exceeded, the vehicle may become unstable in roll/yaw. The maximum airspeed limit is 486 KEAS.

section.p: The minimum airspeed for Mach less than 5.0 is 163 KEAS.
